    • Method Detail

      • storeChooser

        public void storeChooser(Characters firstChar)
        Prompts the user on what shop they want to access.
        Parameters:
        firstChar -

      • createArmorStore

        public void createArmorStore(Characters firstChar)
        Creates an armor store for the player where the player can buy or sell armor. The store inventory is populated with armor from the race of the town. It displays the information about the item, and when selected it checks if the player has free inventory spots.
        Parameters:
        firstChar -

      • createWeaponStore

        public void createWeaponStore(Characters firstChar)
        Creates a weapon shop for the player where the player can buy or sell weapons. The store inventory is populated with weapons from the race of the town. It displays the information about the item, and when selected it checks if the player has free inventory spots. In the weapon shop the player can also get the strange rock item identified.
        Parameters:
        firstChar -

      • createInn

        public void createInn(Characters firstChar)
               throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Creates an inn for the player to rest at for a cost, the player then gets put back to full health.
        Parameters:
        firstChar -
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • createJobBoard

        public void createJobBoard(Characters firstChar)
        Creates a list of jobs the player can take, the name of the employer is determined by the race of the town.
        Parameters:
        firstChar -
